title: The Malay Peninsula: people and products
brief_description: An account of life in modern Malaya showing the following: geography of the country; Singapore as a mixture of the civilisations of the East and West; the religions of Malaya; village life; the natural resources, including tin, coconuts, rubber, rice and tea; European influences in Malaya.
